bibl.title: Diocletian and Elephantine: A Closer Look at Pococke's Puzzle (IGRR 1.1291 = SB 5.8393).
bibl.note: C.I.G. III, 4892 = I.G.R. I, 1291 = S.B. V, 8393. Re-edition, translation and notes. The inscription alludes to a series of events culminating in Diocletian's presence at Syene.
Brennan Peter, Diocletian and Elephantine: A Closer Look at Pococke's Puzzle (IGRR 1.1291 = SB 5.8393).
